definition: first love
at first/(at the) beginning/first/junior/basic
to feel attached to/to long for/to love
feelings of first love

sentences.english: Author mark is very obvious in the description interposing in "first love".
sentences.chinese: 作者在《初戀》中設置的敘述標記非常明顯。

sentences.english: Memories of his first love were still enshrined in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 他依然將初戀的回憶珍藏在心的神翕裏。

sentences.english: First love is singing about vernal blazing passion, performing our young maturation.
sentences.chinese: 初戀吟唱着青春熾烈的激情，上演着我們青澀的成熟。

sentences.english: Thai Arabica Coffee is my first lover.
sentences.chinese: 泰國咖啡，我的初戀情人。

sentences.english: My first love, I and you have mutual affinity.
sentences.chinese: 我的初戀，我與你心心相印。
還記得你的初戀女友是誰？

sentences.english: Brother got married, my sister-in-law is my first love.
sentences.chinese: 哥哥結婚了，嫂子竟然是我得初戀情人。

sentences.english: I don’t think anybody really gets over his first love.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲沒有人能夠真正忘掉初戀。

sentences.english: My first love was when I was in high school.
sentences.chinese: 我的初戀是在高中的時候。

sentences.english: After all, she was my first lover.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，她是我的初戀情人。

sentences.english: We're highschool sweethearts and he was my first.
sentences.chinese: 我們高中開始就在一起，他是我的初戀。

sentences.english: The first kiss with his girlfriend first love, she whole body tingling .
sentences.chinese: 第一次與初戀女友接吻，她全身發麻。

sentences.english: They prefer to be the woman's first love.
sentences.chinese: 他們喜歡當女人的初戀情人。
毫無經驗的初戀是迷人的。

sentences.english: There is nothing holier , in this life of ours . than the first consciousness of love.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的生命中，沒有什麼能比意識到初戀更神聖。

sentences.english: Unexperienced love is charming, while durable-love is priceless.
sentences.chinese: 初戀是迷人的，但是經受住時間的愛情是無價的。
